text: sel su issneun myeochilgan-ila. geudaedeul jung nugungaga byeongjaigeona jang-geoli idong jung-il ttaeneun semhan nalsu(dansig-eul kkaen nalsu)mankeum-ui daleun naldeul-ila . geugeos(dansig)eul hal su issneun him-i nam-a issneun janeun sogjoemulloseo bul-uhan jaleul meog-yeoya hanola. seonhaeng-eul jabaljeog-eulo silcheonhaneun jaga issdamyeon geugeos-eun geuege deo joh-eun geos-imyeo geudaedeul-i algo issdamyeon dansig-eul haneun geos-i geudaedeul-ege deo joh-eun geos-ila
